name: Smart Home Box
description:
Transform your home into a smart living space with our expertly curated Smart Home Box. 
Each box includes innovative smart devices, advanced home automation tools, and cutting-edge IoT gadgets. 
Designed for tech enthusiasts and homeowners who want convenience, safety, and efficiency. 
Unbox the future of home living and experience seamless control at your fingertips.
subscription_benefits: Discount on Future Smart Home Purchases

name: Home Office Tech Box
description:
Boost your productivity and upgrade your remote workspace with essential office tech gear. 
The Home Office Tech Box includes ergonomic tools, wireless devices, and smart cable management solutions. 
Ideal for professionals working from home or hybrid setups needing efficiency and comfort. 
Create your ideal tech-enabled workspace without the stress of researching or shopping.

name: STEM Discovery Box
description:
Inspire young minds with hands-on STEM activities that make learning fun and engaging. 
Each box features kid-friendly experiments in science, technology, engineering, and math. 
Includes online learning resources, challenge cards, and parental guides. 
Perfect for curious kids and parents who want education through exploration.

name: Coding Care Package
description:
Empower your coding journey with monthly packages tailored for developers and learners. 
Each delivery includes programming books, productivity tools, and ergonomic gear. 
Enjoy curated content that boosts your skills and helps avoid burnout. 
Whether you're a beginner or pro, this box delivers growth with every unboxing.

name: AI Learning Box
description:
Dive into the exciting world of Artificial Intelligence with hands-on learning kits. 
Each box includes mini projects, ML tutorials, and curated datasets to build real-world AI models. 
Learn concepts from beginner to advanced levels with structured guidance. 
Great for students, developers, and tech lovers looking to stay ahead.

name: VR Explorer
description:
Step into new virtual worlds with the VR Explorer Box delivered every quarter. 
Includes VR content access, game credits, and accessories for immersive experiences. 
Explore interactive content from education to gaming and fitness. 
Perfect for VR enthusiasts and developers wanting exclusive VR perks.

name: Bookworm Box
description:
Rediscover the joy of reading with hand-selected books and literary treats. 
Includes bookmarks, journals, and access to themed reader challenges. 
Connect with your favorite authors through signed letters and club memberships. 
A perfect gift for avid readers and book lovers of all ages.

name: Green Living Box
description:
Live sustainably with eco-friendly products curated to reduce your carbon footprint. 
Every box includes zero-waste tools, reusable items, and natural cleaners. 
Learn new green habits through tips and member-only content. 
Ideal for eco-conscious individuals looking to make a difference.

name: Coffee Explorer Box
description:
Discover the world of specialty coffee with fresh beans delivered to your door. 
Enjoy single-origin selections, tasting notes, and expert brewing guides. 
Includes bonuses like coupons, roast samples, and roaster interviews. 
Ideal for coffee lovers eager to explore global flavors.
